_header: Mine hearts joy and all mine whole pleasaunce
Note: For another text in 8-line stanzas see 3613.
_description: ‘A lettyr’, attributed to the Duke of Suffolk — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
Myn hertys Ioy and all myn hole plesaunceWhom that I serue and
                    shall do faythfully…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Of verey trouth as thou canst wele remembreAt myn vpryst the
                    fyst day of decembre
